Module io.github.ljnelson.oci.secrets.configsource

module io.github.ljnelson.oci.secrets.configsource
Provides packages related to building ConfigSource implementations that can get property values from an OCI secret bundle.
Author:
Laird Nelson

  • Packages

    Exports
    Package
    Description
    io.github.ljnelson.oci.secrets.configsource
    Provides classes and interfaces related to implementing ConfigSources that return values from an OCI vault secret.
